sentences.english: Snow white tried in vain to please her step-mother.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主嘗試取悅後母是徒勞的。

sentences.english: Cinderella lives with her cruel stepmother and two selfish stepsisters, who, jealous of her beauty and sweet temper, treat her as a servant.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘和他刻薄的後母與自私的姐姐住在一起。

sentences.english: The two sisters and the stepmother were mean to Cinderella.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘在他的後母和姊姊眼中是很低劣的。

sentences.english: I hated my stepmother as soon as I saw her.
sentences.chinese: 我一見到我的後母，我就討厭她了。

sentences.english: She doesn't like Hansel and Gretel.
sentences.chinese: 後母卻不喜歡漢瑟與葛麗特。

sentences.english: Cinderella is the thorn in her stepmother's flesh.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘是她後母的眼中釘肉中刺。
“你們兩個頑皮的孩子，”後母說。

sentences.english: Being a stepmother, she hesitated to criticize the boy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲是後母，她對批評孩子有顧慮。

sentences.english: At least she won’t have to worry about a wicked stepmother for the girls.
sentences.chinese: 至少她不必擔心惡毒的後母虐待兩個女孩兒。

sentences.english: She looked at me as if I were the wicked stepmother.
sentences.chinese: 她看我的眼神，我簡直就是一個惡毒的後母。

definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to meet with misfortune/to fall into dire straits
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
